root.name: WeaponLord
root.description: Weaponlord is a fighting game that was released for the Sega Genesis and Super Nintendo, it is notable for the fact that it was the only game specificly designed from the ground up to use the Xband peripheral for internet play. (The rest of the games available for the service were essentially hacked into by Catapault, the makers of Xband.)
